totals.sql: select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as pobtot, sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as pobmas, sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as pobfem, sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as vivtot, sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as tvivhab, sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) ) as pob0_14, sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as pob15_64, sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as pob65_mas from datosestadisticos.ent THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as pobtot, sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as pobmas, sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as pobfem, sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as vivtot, sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as tvivhab, sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) ) as pob0_14, sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as pob15_64, sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as pob65_mas from datosestadisticos.mun THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as pobtot, sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as pobmas, sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as pobfem, sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as vivtot, sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as tvivhab, sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) ) as pob0_14, sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as pob15_64, sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as pob65_mas from datosestadisticos.locurb THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as pobtot, sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as pobmas, sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as pobfem, sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as vivtot, sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as tvivhab, sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) ) as pob0_14, sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as pob15_64, sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as pob65_mas from datosestadisticos.locrur THEWHERE

table.user_alias: Nombres de Áreas Naturales y Culturales
table.name: toponimosar

totals.sql: select nom_gen as descripcion, count(nom_gen) as total from nombresgeograficos.toponimosar THEWHERE group by nom_gen
select nom_gen as descripcion, count(nom_gen) as total from nombresgeograficos.toponimosfl THEWHERE group by nom_gen
select nom_gen as descripcion, count(nom_gen) as total from nombresgeograficos.toponimosid THEWHERE group by nom_gen
select nom_gen as descripcion, count(nom_gen) as total from nombresgeograficos.toponimosrh THEWHERE group by nom_gen
select nom_gen as descripcion, count(nom_gen) as total from nombresgeograficos.toponimosro THEWHERE group by nom_gen

select case when type = '010' then 'Estación Geodésica Vertical' when type = '011' then 'Estación Geodésica Vertical con Gravedad' when type = '100' then 'Estación Geodésica Horizontal' when type = '111' then 'Estación Geodésica Horizontal con Nivelación y Gravedad' when type = '101' then 'Estación Geodésica Horizontal con Gravedad' when type = '110' then 'Estación Geodésica Horizontal con Nivelación' else 'Marca geodésica' end as descripcion, count(type) as total from marcas_geodesicas.marca THEWHERE group by type
select elevacion as descripcion, count(elevacion) as total from altimetria.ccun50 THEWHERE group by elevacion order by elevacion

totals.sql: select null as info_pob, sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as pobtot, sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as pobmas, sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as pobfem, sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as vivtot, sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) ) as pob0_14, sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as pob15_64, sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as pob65_mas, null as info_estab, sum (s1) as s1, sum (s2) as s2, sum (s3) as s3, sum (s4) as s4, sum (s5) as s5, sum (s6) as s6, sum (s7) as s7, sum (s8) as s8, sum (s9) as s9, sum (s10) as s10, sum (s11) as s11, sum (s12) as s12, sum (s13) as s13, sum (s14) as s14, sum (s15) as s15, sum (s16) as s16, sum (s17) as s17, sum (s18) as s18, sum (s19) as s19, sum (s20) as s20 from datosestadisticos.mza THEWHERE
